name: Microsoft Azure Agent Installer for Backup and Site Recovery权限提升漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Azure Agent for Backup", "Microsoft Azure Agent for Site Recovery"]
description: Microsoft Azure Agent Installer for Backup and Site Recovery为本地计算机和Azure VM提供灾难恢复解决方案。Microsoft Azure Agent Installer for Backup and Site Recovery存在权限提升漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞提升权限。
solution:
前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-21199
patch: Microsoft Azure Agent Installer for Backup and Site Recovery权限提升漏洞的补丁
